title: Cucumber in a dream  Interpretation of buying and eating cucumbers in a dream for pregnant women, married women, and single women

preview.html: Ibn Sirin said in his book (Interpretation of Big Dreams): Cucumbers in a dream signify depression and sadness, so whoever sees that he is eating them, he will struggle in a matter that is difficult or exhausting, especially its yellow color. Illness. If the fortuneteller is married and his wife is pregnant, and he sees in a dream that he is eating cucumbers, then his wife may give birth to a female, and God will help him. As for Al-Nabulsi, he mentioned cucumbers in his book (The Smell of an Animal in the Interpretation of a Dream), where he said: All cucumbers are good for the one who sees them in a dream or He saw him buying it or eating it, or even planting or picking it, and the green cucumber in the interpretation is better than the yellow one. Interpretation of a cucumber in a single woman’s dream. A single cucumber in a dream corresponds to the interpretation with zucchini, squash, and watermelon of all kinds, and it is considered a sign of nutrition and stability of the substance, if its appearance and taste are good. And about the bitterness of life. Commentators hated seeing pickled cucumbers because their yellowish color could indicate illness, fatigue, or unhappiness, while it is commendable to see single people eating fresh green cucumbers, as they match in interpretation with other fruits and appetizers. The choice is good, as Sheikh Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi pointed out. Cucumber is praiseworthy in a person’s sleep, because in his wakefulness it is beneficial for health, and any plant rich in water is considered in the interpretation to be a harbinger of food, and it is generally praised for buying it, eating it, and cutting it. Harvesting or harvesting them. Interpretation of cucumbers in a dream for a married woman. If the cucumbers are healthy, neither melted nor spoiled, then in the interpretation they are good and a blessing. Whoever sees a married woman as if she is buying them or putting them with food, then, God willing, she will receive food or money. If a married woman sees that she is eating a cucumber or drinking its juice, this is evidence of good health, and the dream is like a person feeding her cucumbers, so her worries will go away, with God’s permission and choice. In interpretation, it indicates the presence of girls, but some regions of the Maghreb consider it good news for the birth of boys. If a married woman desires to become pregnant or have children, and she sees in her dream that cucumbers are growing in her house or garden, then her desire will come true, God willing. But if a married woman sees that Her husband bought her a cucumber and brought it into the house. Many good things can overwhelm the family and make them happy, and green cucumbers are much better, God willing. Cucumbers deserve praise in a married woman’s sleep if she likes its taste while she is awake. It also deserves praise for one who is accustomed to buying or using it. Like other climbing garden plants, cucumber is considered a symbol of health and healing, especially if the pregnant woman is seen eating large amounts of it, and it is praiseworthy if she is seen drinking its beautiful green juice. The choice may indicate To the female child, as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi indicated, but in some Arab regions, especially in North Africa, they consider seeing her in a pregnant dream a symbol of a male child, based on a general or common. Fantasy. With this, ladies and gentlemen, we have finished the interpretation of cucumbers in a dream. We hope, God willing, a short and renewed meeting with you until then.

title: Interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream for a married woman. If you want to know the interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream for a married woman, it should be noted that this depends on the details of the dream itself. Below we mention the opinions of dream interpretation scholars regarding this vision for a married woman: If a married woman sees A lice falls from her hair and she walks on the bed in which she sleeps. This indicates that he will obtain a lot of goodness in the shortest period of time. Some commentators say that a lice falling from a married woman’s hair indicates that she will soon be freed from her troubles and worries. But if a married woman sees that Lice falls from her hair into her clothes and walks on her. This indicates her high status at work and that she will rise to high positions. Some commentators say that this position and promotions will happen to her husband. If a married woman dreams that she kills lice by combing her hair. This indicates that she was able to get rid of lice. Some people who hate her and envy her for what she has, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream. Interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that lice are falling from her hair, she can kill them. And in this vision, she is given good tidings that she will go through her pregnancy and pass it. Fine, and that she will give birth and give birth to the fetus easily and without difficulty, and God knows best. Some interpreters also believe that the interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream concerns the pregnant woman. This may indicate that there are people who do not love her and wish her harm and are present around her as neighbors, friends, or family. If a pregnant woman sees that there is lice in her hair and it falls out, and she can get rid of it in her sleep. This indicates that she will be able to get rid of her problems in reality and that she will feel stable and comfortable in her life. But if the pregnant woman sees that there is lice in her hair that is biting her, this indicates that she has Enemies who offend her. Some interpreters believe that the interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a pregnant woman’s dream could indicate the pregnancy of the woman she sees. If a pregnant woman sees large numbers of lice spreading in her home, she cannot control them, but in the end she gets rid of them This indicates that some women enter her house to watch her and chase her, and she must pay attention to them, and God knows best. Interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations for Ibn Sirin to see a dream of lice falling from the hair, and below we present these interpretations: Ibn Sirin says: If He saw lice falling from his hair in a dream. This indicates that the dreamer will suffer from an illness and that he will be exposed to psychological harm in his life in the coming period, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. This respected scholar also said that the interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream is for a married or single woman or any woman. A person. It appears that the viewer is confused and suffers from a lack of concentration and cannot make the right decisions during this time. Ibn Sirin also says that lice falling from the hair may indicate that there are many envious eyes close to the fortuneteller. The dreamer must warn and warn

title: Interpretation of tomatoes in a dream Eating tomatoes in a dream

preview.html: Tomatoes Tomatoes in a dream for a single woman Tomatoes in a dream for a pregnant woman Buying tomatoes in a dream Red tomatoes in a single woman's dream Cutting tomatoes in a dream Interpretation of a dream about tomatoes by Imam al-Sadiq Eating tomatoes in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of a dream about eating tomatoes for a single woman The distinctive red color of tomatoes, unlike other plants, and their beautiful and sometimes attractive shape make them a strong and intense symbol of women. If you eat tomatoes in a dream, this means good health. If you see fruit growing in the field, it means satisfaction and family happinessIf a woman sees ripe tomatoes, it means that she will find happiness in marriageTomatoes show food as much as I can seeSeeing tomatoes in a dream is a symbol of happiness and family harmonyAnd if you dream that you are eating tomatoes, this dream promises you good healthTomatoes in the dream of an unmarried girlIf an unmarried girl sees that she is eating tomatoes, this is interpreted as a special emotional experience that can lead to marriage, especially if the tomatoes in the dream are ripe and have a beautiful shape. Many tomatoes in a person's dream may express a great love for a person or a group.Tomatoes in a married woman's dreamIf a married woman sees a lot of tomatoes in a dream, this indicates a state of anxiety or psychological depression, and the dream may also express an urgent need for money.But if a married woman sees as if someone in a dream fed her red tomatoes, this means sustenance.Tomatoes in a pregnant woman's dreamTomatoes in a pregnant woman's dream indicate a boy if they are red, and a female child if they are green, and God knows best.Tomatoes generally symbolize good health or natural birth.Tomatoes in a single or married man's dreamTomatoes in a man's dream indicate a woman, If it is beautiful and red, it means a good wife or a good wife. Green tomatoes in a man's dream symbolize a diet in which he is tired or money that comes after effort or something like that. Interpretation of buying tomatoes in a dream Buying tomatoes in a dream expresses the dreamer's ability to overcome his ordeal or problems. If the price is expensive, this means great difficulties that the fortuneteller will overcome in a short time. But if the dreamer sees that he is buying tomatoes at a cheap or easy price, then he accepts a period of material prosperity. Buying green tomatoes in a dream indicates that the dreamer accepts issues that are not in his time or rushes to make fateful decisions, and perhaps buying green tomatoes in a dream indicates an early marriage. Planting tomatoes in dream interpretation Planting tomatoes in visions expresses a guaranteed result or a profitable business or an activity with excellent financial feasibility, such as buying bonds or stocks or investing in general. Planting tomatoes in a dream indicates a benefit that a close person hopes for, and the sign of certain profit and goodness in this vision is the dreamer’s vision as if his planting has ripened or the time for harvest has come. Harvesting tomatoes in visions and dream interpretation Harvesting tomatoes in a dream, picking them or collecting and storing them indicates great profits

Tomatoes in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate a boy if they are red, and a female child if they are green, and God knows best. Tomatoes generally symbolize good health or natural birth. Green tomatoes in a man’s dream symbolize a diet in which he is tired or money that comes after effort or something like that. Interpretation of buying tomatoes in a dream Buying tomatoes in a dream expresses About the dreamer's ability to overcome his adversity or problems. If the price is high, this means great difficulties that the fortuneteller will overcome in a short time. But if the dreamer sees that he is buying tomatoes at a cheap or easy price, then he is accepting a period of material prosperity. Buying green tomatoes in a dream indicates that the dreamer is accepting issues that are not in his time or is rushing to make fateful decisions, and perhaps buying green tomatoes in a dream indicates an early marriage. Planting tomatoes in dream interpretation Planting tomatoes in visions expresses a guaranteed result, a profitable business, or an activity with excellent financial feasibility, such as buying bonds, stocks, or investing in general. Planting tomatoes in a dream indicates a benefit hoped for by a close person, and a sign of certain profit and goodness in this The vision is the dreamer seeing as if his planting has matured or it is time to harvest. title: Interpretation of a dream about an oven

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about an oven: The oven in our lives is one of the basic requirements that we cannot refuse at home, and through it you can prepare food and seeing it in a dream has multiple connotations and we will tell you the most important of them in this article, which we refer to Interpretation of a dream about an oven. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dream Interpretation of a dream about an oven Interpretation Dream of the Oven: If an unmarried girl sees that the oven is working in her dream, she will gain the love of others around her and hear happy news in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing her food being cooked in it indicates that a good man will come to marry her and provide for her in the near future. And if she notices that food is in it, Immature, this may indicate that he is suffering from family or emotional problems. The presence of a burn in the oven indicates that she has heard bad news that affects her condition. Whoever sees that he is putting a lot of bread in the oven, he will get a lot of money. You may be interested in: Aries In a dream, interpretation of a dream about an oven for a married woman: A married woman lighting the oven in a dream symbolizes that she will obtain a lot of sustenance that will come back to her, her husband, and her children. Cooking meat with it indicates that he will gain his goodness and future, and God knows best. If she wipes it, she will face some problems in her life. Seeing a new oven in her dream symbolizes her pregnancy in the coming period, and God knows best. If she fails, this may be an indication that she will be exposed to some problems in pregnancy. A married woman kneading bread and putting it in the oven indicates that she will live a halal life. Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream in a dream. A dream. The oven in a divorced woman’s dream sometimes expresses that she is exposed to problems that affect her psychological state. Also, burning it in her dream symbolizes that she will face many problems in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about building, demolishing, and building the oven Building an oven in a dream indicates the dreamer’s participation in a project or public interest. If It was built inside the house, so this indicates the establishment of a home for the family. Interpretation of seeing an oven in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream lighting the oven means that she will gain the love of her husband and his relatives and gain food and kindness. And if she cooks food with it, she will easily give birth to a good boy, and God knows best. And whoever sees in Her dream while she was pregnant is that she was sitting next to the oven, this indicates that her birth is approaching. The large oven in her dream is a promising vision, as it expresses that she will give birth in peace and hear happy news. Washing the dead. Interpretation of a dream about an oven for a man. The dream of an oven in a man’s dream indicates his ambitions and dreams that he wants to achieve. Seeing things Other than food, it shows the difficulties and problems that he will face in his life. Putting food into the oven symbolizes the happiness that a married man experiences in his life with his wife and frees him from worries and problems. As for burning these foods, it symbolizes loss in work, and burning the oven in a single person’s dream indicates On his marriage to a beautiful and fair virgin. Interpretation of a dream about bread in the oven. A dream about a loaf of bread indicates making profits through lawful means. If an unmarried girl sees bread with her, she will satisfy her desires and marry a man of good character. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about death by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding, the meaning of a wedding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding for a single woman. Marrying a married woman in a dream. A wedding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about wedding. Interpretation of joy in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a married bride. Interpretation of marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretations of wedding dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a dream about marriage by al-Nabulsi: Marriage in a dream shows the providence of God Almighty, and perhaps marriage indicates Families, religion, anxiety and grief. Marriage, according to custom, is a position or a good reputation, and marriage is a profession. Whoever sees that he married a woman and then she dies, he is working in a craft that brings nothing but work, toil, and anxiety. . A Christian woman, she strives in an art that contains falsehood, and if she is a Zoroastrian, then it is an art without religion. He was given a kingship if he qualified for it, otherwise he assumed regency. And whoever marries a dead person, he will get a dead death. He has despaired. And from his stepfather, he sells his property. If a pregnant woman sees that she is married, she will give birth to a maid, and if a pure bride gives birth to a son, and if he sees a woman. He has a son who got married and then his son married. She became poor, and whoever sees that she has married a woman and has a wife or wives, she will be given choice and power according to beauty and appearance. Of the woman, if he sees her and knows her. If she marries an unknown sheikh, she will do a lot, and if she is sick, her fiery rival or king will be cured of her illness, and everything the earth has indicated for him in terms of comfort, fatigue, good, and evil, he will pay the wife a soul in exchange for her proposals. Interpretation of a dream about marriage, getting married, or getting married. In a dream by Sheikh Abdul Rahman bin Sirin - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a dog according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a bear is one of the things that sometimes makes the dreamer worry and panic, because it is one of the frightening things that are used to intimidate in ordinary life. As for seeing it in a dream, its interpretation depends on the color and type of the bear. For more information, please be with us. Interpretation of a dream about a bearInterpretation of a dream about a bear in a dream symbolizes a clear hostility between the dreamer and one of his relatives or household members. The enemy could be neighbors or friends, but whoever sees that he has... A bear and controls it. The vision indicates that the dreamer has reached a high and prestigious position that he has been waiting for for a long time and did not expect to happen at this time. Whoever dreams of a large snake, this indicates that he has an evil enemy that is difficult to control, but whoever sees that this animal is divided into two parts, This indicates that he will defeat his enemies in the near future and achieve what he wants. Desires, and the vision may indicate that he is an intelligent person, and a good thinker can manage his affairs very wisely. Interpretation of a dream about a bear by Ibn Sirin According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, a dream about a bear shows enemies in the dreamer’s life, because Satan has what he deserves from God to reach Adam, peace be upon him, and to come out of Paradise, its size, thickness and type, the color and strength of the poison play an important role in the interpretation of the dream. If one sees a dead snake, it is a very deadly enemy, and God Almighty will please him from its evil, and whoever sees its eggs, it is an enemy that is difficult to overcome, due to the large number and multiplicity of enemies. Interpretation of a dream about a bear for a single womanInterpretation A dream about a bear for an unmarried woman indicates the anxiety, sadness, and anguish that she suffers from. If the bear tries to play with the single woman and approaches her, caressing him and laughing with him, this indicates the presence of a person in life who wants to be obscene and approach her with the intention of harming her reputation and honor. If she sees the unmarried woman That the bear is chasing her, but she is trying to escape from it and run in fear of it, this indicates in the vision her intelligence and knowledge of the enemies and evil people who want to harm her, and in the vision it is an indication that he is in constant need of God’s companionship and protection, so he must pray a lot and supplicate. Interpretation of a woman’s dream The married woman: The bear in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the many and varied problems that the dreamer suffers from. If the married woman sees more than one bear and their appearance is familiar, then the vision indicates the presence of many unkind people who long for her. She breaks out in her home and wants not to be happy in her married life, and these people are often parents or relatives. A large bear in a married woman’s dream indicates difficult problems, while a small bear indicates small problems and crises, and the presence of a bear in a married woman’s privacy indicates the presence of an evil woman. She wants to spoil her home. Interpretation of a dream about a bear for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a bear in her dream, this means that she is carrying a boy, God willing. But her birth will be easy and she will not suffer from psychological or health effects after birth. If the monster is black, then the vision indicates difficulty and suffering during childbirth, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a tableau for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream indicates
